list.title: Japan Waiyuan East Medical Examination Center
list.cnt: Japan's most advanced cancer screening institution, using the unique cancer screening technology can detect and exclude a variety of early stage cancers, to ensure that you are not cancer and serious disease risk in the future.

list.title: Particle Line Cancer Treatment Center
list.cnt: At present, cancer is still one of the major factors affecting health, and human beings are constantly fighting against it with the power of scientific and technological progress. Hitachi Particle Line cancer treatment system as a cancer treatment 'killer card', footprints all over the world.
